entry.title: FOG ADVISORY, Simcoe
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:50 a.m. EDT Friday 5 May 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High 15 except 10 near Lake Erie.
